website_summaries.verdict: A responsive hybrid mattress that keeps you comfortable all night long.
pros: A great choice for all types of sleepers as it’s one of the most responsive mattresses on the market
It's composed of cooling gel foam and caliber coil
cons: Needs to be used on a non-flexible base, so you may need to make some adjustments

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Us!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I wanted a King size bed to accommodate our growing family (newborn baby). We came across Nest Bedding. I was intrigued by the double sided design for firm and medium. I figured we could test out and placed the order. The bed came in less than a week and we were ready to try out each side. Much to my surprise, the bed was very comfortable and large enough for the three of us to sprawl out on. The cooling gel support foam was a plus especially since my husband and child are hot blooded sleepers. I definitely recommend this bed and may make future purchases!
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Quality mattress
customer_reviews.text: There are several good things to say about this bed. First off, it came in a nicely compact package that opened into the queen size bed in seconds. The bed is definitely high quality and several times more comfortable compared to our old bed. We’ve only tried sleeping on the medium side, but already our quality of sleep has improved a whole bunch. We honestly couldn’t have asked more for a new bed.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth lee

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We've had this mattress for about 2 months and sleep on the medium side and it's so comfortable. We got a king and it's sitting on a bowed slat platform bed frame. I'm also 9 months pregnant and it's still comfortable if that tells you anything. We slept on it after 3 hours of opening it with no problems. Also, it's extremely heavy so keep that in mind when it's delivered so you have help getting it to your bed frame, opening it and flipping it to the side you want to sleep on. *Update -9/14/2019* This bed is still comfortable and still looks great with no sagging anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Wendav

customer_reviews.title: Budget mattress for light folks
customer_reviews.text: I think this mattress suits better lighter people (kids, etc). For me close to 200, I felt support was lacking on areas like hip, etc. For comparison, I have 3.5 years old NestBed Signature queen which I feel is much more comfortable for me (support is class different). As price indicates, this is a budget mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I am furious that I purchased a mattress with a "10 year warranty" and when I started getting serious backaches after just 6 weeks of use, the seller informed me I only had 30 days to return it...so I missed the deadline by 15 days. What does the 10 year warranty cover? I am miserable when I wake up every morning and it's only getting worse. I am of average weight yet after a few hours in bed it sags and does not support my lower back.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Gangi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bed!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time purchasing this bed. At first, I was kind of skeptical of what to expect, but as soon as I received the bed, I was pleasantly surprised on how comfortable it was. The shipping was quick and easy. I am very pleased with what I ordered and am looking forward onto purchasing more for my children!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Yang

customer_reviews.title: Neither side is Firm or medium both sides are Soft
customer_reviews.text: Both sides very soft and i here the springs moving around and No edge support, you feel like you gonna roll off sides, im not to happy with this bed. but Amazon is still Awesome
customer_reviews.author: Indemand

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The build quality seems fine. However the plush and firm side are not supportive at all. It’s more like one side is so soft your butt touches the floor and firm side feels way to plush. The springs inside do not support any weight what so ever. Might be ok for kids but not for adults. Very disappointed in this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: gurpaldeep

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed! I've ordered a few mattresses on-line and this is the best yet. The fact that you can actually flip the mattress like they all used to is reason enough to buy it as you get twice the wear. One side is more firm as well. I've been having back pain for awhile and really didn't think about it being my mattress. The first morning I woke from sleeping in this one, I was SO pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 10 Pizzas out of 5 Noodles
customer_reviews.text: As a college student, beds are really important. You gotta get that sleep in after long hours of doing homework or studying, and I've been able to do that with this mattress. It's very comfortable and haven't had a bad night's rest ever since. Amazing shipping for such a large item as well. 10/5 like the title says.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Thao

customer_reviews.title: A Terrific Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I am 100% satisfied with my new mattress. It is high quality, very comfortable, and was easy to have shipped and to install. The price is unbelievable and the quality is very high. I tried both sides and selected the "firm" option. It gives me a wonderful night's sleep. A real value and so easy to order and install. I am aware of two other people in my orbit who also have bought this item and both are as happy as I am. Don't pay a mattress store thousands of dollars and go through the delivery/ set up process. My bed in a box was delivered to my door, no fuss no mess!
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: Good for price, but long term quality is lacking.
customer_reviews.text: It has been a great mattress for the price but it wasn’t more than 3 weeks before it started to sink on my side. I do like that it’s double sided and one is firm and the other soft. For the price I can’t complain too much. If you are thinking this will last a long while, you are probably in for a disappointment. But if you want to go cheap and get by then this is great for you.
customer_reviews.author: Christine C.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with this one.  QC could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mattress. Having slept on a horrible mattress, the difference is night and day. Currently using the medium side and it probably leans more towards soft than medium in my opinion. No issues with tossing and turning. Sleeping like a baby. Quality control could be improved. Deducting a star because the mattress had hand prints on the firm side. It is way too much hassle at this point to return it because I had to drag this up a flight of stairs. Otherwise have really enjoyed this.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: If you want a firm mattress, beware!!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress was advertised as having a "firm" side and we bought it because we wanted firmness. Instead, we got a mattress that created a trough in the middle as we slept. Not firm at all.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Kanter

customer_reviews.title: Saggy and causing back pain
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this bed for about 8 months. I've refused to get rid of it because I'm frugal, but it's really beginning to hurt my body. I'm about 180lbs, and once the bed warms up, it sags like a banana. Most nights I'm trying to find a flat spot (usually the edges) to ease my spine, but I invariably fall back into the middle and wake up with back pain.
customer_reviews.author: J. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this mattress
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but felt safer buying a bed in a box with optional firmness on each side. I really like this bed. It feels so much better than my old bed. My back feels so much better. I like the medium and my husband likes the firm. But we can both sleep on either side comfortably. Figure we will just flip it every 6 months or so. I got my son a different cheaper brand and it feels just as nice. I probabbly would have been happy with that one too. I guess time will tell if one is more durable.
customer_reviews.author: mom

customer_reviews.title: Cool rest.
customer_reviews.text: Love the bed! Love that the bed is cool when you lay down on it. We enjoy the choice between firm and soft and the we are able to flip the bed if needed. We did let the bed “air” out for 24hrs before putting on our box springs. Comfortable bed for the price!
customer_reviews.author: MARIA RADEMACHER

customer_reviews.title: What good sleep feels like
customer_reviews.text: My last mattress wasn’t super old (maybe 4 years?) but I noticed it started getting “lumpy” and just wasn’t getting a great sleep out of it anymore. I started considering upgrading to a memory foam mattress, but after researching numerous brands, found out most of them had fiberglass in them..?? (WTF?) I came across this one based on my search history and read nothing but positive reviews. By far, probably the best mattress I’ve ever owned in my life and I’m writing this review about two months in and I’m still getting the best sleep like, ever. SERIOUSLY, PICK THIS ONE!
customer_reviews.author: Cee

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: This bed has been my back savior. I have sciatica, stenosis, and degenerative disc disease and sleeping has been a nightmare. I waited 6 months to write this review so I could really see how it would affect me. I sleep better, I wake up in far less pain, and I didn't break the bank doing it. Yes, it really is as good as people say. My partner loves it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sallie Cooper

customer_reviews.title: PLEASANTLY SURPRISING COMFORT
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this medium/firm mattress for my brother who us 6'4" and about 270. When it first arrived, he put it on his bed and took a nap. He got out of bed, a couple of hours later and realized that his back didn't hurt. He started with the medium side and loved it. Once he flips it, the firm side will likely be perfect. I usually spend $600 on a mattress set, so this was a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Relax and Have that glass of wine 🍷!
customer_reviews.text: Using this as main mattress for a year...I was convinced we had the space for a king bed and upgraded from a full - delivery was fine and compact, don’t recall much smell and let it acclimate for around 6-8 hours. Very satisfied— also word to the wise, stains clean up easy with burts bees dry shampoo for cats...spray, soak, wipe. So go ahead and have that glass of wine or saucy wings, you’ve earned it!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine @ BT

customer_reviews.title: Too bouncy, not firm. #tacobed
customer_reviews.text: This has two sides to choose from. Firm and medium firm. We use the firm side and it’s just not firm enough. Bed is super bouncy, if that’s what you’re looking for. Corners, bottom and top edge seem to still slope down after a few months of use. It seems to “taco” when sleeping next to another person. My husband is 5’11”/180 lbs and I am 4’11”/140 lbs. It’s more uncomfortable with two people in it than one. I wouldn’t purchase again. It seemed to be the only mattress that would ship to Alaska, which I really appreciate!
customer_reviews.author: LucyGoosey

customer_reviews.title: comfortable mattress so far
customer_reviews.text: Less aches and pains in the morning. hope the mattress hold up to the warrenty
customer_reviews.author: Tom.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Nest Bed- not very durable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my elderly mother. The quality was better than the bed she had been sleeping in but doesn’t seem to be holding up that well. We flip it bc she often sits by the hour on the side of her bed. In that spot it seems to be breaking down. I probably would not by this again, it just hasn’t been that durable. Plus it’s almost impossible to unpack without cutting the mattress. We nicked a place, removing it from package. They give you a tool to remove it but I didn’t find tool until it was too late.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfortable bed!
customer_reviews.text: Both the medium and the firm side feel great! I sleep on the firm side because it helps my back pain. It did smell funny for about 2 weeks. The edge support is great. I weigh 125 lbs (5'5) and it works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: dusty

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly awesome
customer_reviews.text: What a surprise. I ordered the Nest Flip mattress but was unsure of what I would get. Came well packaged and the whole family enjoyed it coming to life. It is a great mattress. We have been using it for approximately one month. Awesome I recommend it highly. The only negative was the each side was not marked firm or soft and it was in the photos. No biggie though
customer_reviews.author: topcop101

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Nest bed mattress. I thought it would be a little bit taller, but otherwise, it is perfect. I would suggest that you install this in the morning. the packaging says that it is ready to go in just a few minutes of rolling out, but I think a few hours can help it reach maximum volume. A very comfortable bed leaps and bounds better than my old mattress. you will need two people to lift as it is heavy in its rolled-up form.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan

customer_reviews.title: OK for Small People or a Guest Bed
customer_reviews.text: With the good reviews, my husband and I thought we'd try the Flip to save some cash when we needed a new bed. Unfortunately, we needed a more supportive bed. I weigh about 220 lbs, and my hips sink down in this mattress, even on the firm side. My spine was not aligned properly, and I had back pain from day one. We were refunded our money, and we ended up with the Casper Hybrid, which doesn't sink under my weight. If you're a smaller person or looking for a bed for a child or guest room, I think this is a great option. It's not a great option for daily use by larger people or people with back/neck issues.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I searched high and low for a new mattress. We recently purchased a medium firm mattress at a local store and it made my back problems even worse. After reading a ton of mattress reviews online, I took a chance with this one. Now I can't wait to go to bed at night. It feels so soft and luxurious, like we're at a fancy hotel every night. And now I actually sleep again and don't have any back issues. Definitely glad we got this one!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Your Body will thank you!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bed for a guest room at my daughter and SIL's home since I would be staying with them to help with the new baby. I have a sleep number bed at my home and wanted something as comfortable without the hefty price tag...which I didn't really think I would find, btw. To my surprise, this mattress is super comfortable. It keeps you cool at night and I don't wake up sore or stiff. Wish I had found this before my sleep number. :) Great price and even better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Roberson

customer_reviews.title: It’s percect
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Very skeptical about ordering on line but it’s perfect. Hubby is 6’3 205, I am 5’4 130
customer_reviews.author: laurie

customer_reviews.title: Both sides are hard. But atleast it was cheap i guess🤦🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: Its a cheap flippavle mattress. Thats about it. The firm side is unsleepable. The medium firm had me tossing and turning all night. Bought a walmart 2in memory foam topper and problem solved. My couch is softer than the medium side truly. But its a cheap foundation for a memoryfoam topper and since ive added that i sleep like a baby. Would probably not buy this again. Next time will consider soft memory foam. SIDE SLEEPERS BEWARE.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Lynn Hair

customer_reviews.title: No back pain
customer_reviews.text: Old matress my wife and I were waking up with back pain. With the nest matress we are not waking with any back pain so far. I like the fact that you get two chances for the matress to work for you, one plush and one firm. Bought for my camper, if the matress performance stays the way it is now untill fall, 3 month from now I will buy another one for home.
customer_reviews.author: Gary G.

customer_reviews.title: It's comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Package could not be tracked. Arrived about 4 days later than initially scheduled. Other than that the FLIP option is a good idea. I tried both sides for a few nights each, and to be honest I can't tell much of a difference between the two, but the memory foam side seems a tiny bit softer. This is the first mattress I bought online without trying it out in a store first. It's comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable bed. The ability to flip the mattress to a different firmness level makes this a risk free, sight unseen mattress purchase for everyone. I love this mattress more than the expensive tempurpedic I bought 6 months before this purchase. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: ja

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mattress for guests because I needed a new mattress quickly and that wasn't too expensive. I chose this particular mattress because I don't like mattresses that are solely foam and the fact that this mattress is flippable for different degrees of firmness was helpful. All my guests have said it's really comfortable and that they've slept really well.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Petty

customer_reviews.title: ok, impleased for now  -  but will it last?
customer_reviews.text: about a half of year into this mattress im pleased and took a chance with my first roll-up mattress in a box i am concerned if it will last - it already is beginning to feel somewhat less firm after 6 months this is what i fear
customer_reviews.author: Ronald J. Martinkus

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best mattress. I have bought several mattresses and this is one I should have bought in the first place. I no longer wake up with a back ache or shoulder ache. I first slept on the firm side but now sleeping on the medium side. Best for me. Anyone of thinking about buying a mattress you won’t be disappointed in this one.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Nelson

customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this because of the small number of reviews, I'm glad I did though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is very comfortable we tried it on both sides and went with the medium side.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie  Millard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mattress
customer_reviews.text: Our hybrid mattress arrived quickly, was easy to unwrap and expanded to full size in 2 hrs. We use the firm side and it is excellent. There was no odor, the edge provides good support. This mattress is a great value. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: M2books

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, smells for about a month
customer_reviews.text: I shopped around online forever before purchasing this mattress. I find it to be extremely comfortable; I use the medium side and find it to be on the plush side of medium, which is great. The only issue is that it smelled badly like foam for a long time! I'm now about a month in and it is still getting better so I am hopeful that it will fully dissipate soon.
customer_reviews.author: CBP

customer_reviews.title: Seems comfortable, strong foam smell, keeping regardless due to viral crisis.
customer_reviews.text: Received bed three days ago, on 3/22/20. Haven't been able to sleep on it yet due to strong foam smell. Really strong. Hard to imagine it's certi-pur. Must let it air out more. Not returning regardless due to the viral crisis we are all experiencing. Our delivery people, thank goodness for them, have enough on their hands getting the essentials to those who are isolated. So I will keep my nest flip, do my part to stay healthy, and wish everyone good health, light, and love.
customer_reviews.author: Chimi

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Experience
customer_reviews.text: Simple setup. Full expansion in no time. Pretty comfy and quality at a GREAT price! So far whatever reservations I had about the unknown are dashed.
customer_reviews.author: Zola Moon

customer_reviews.title: What an easy way to purchase a comfortable mattress which this definitely is. Thank you.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the frame the mattress went on and love the mattress. Very comfortable. Worked out very well.
customer_reviews.author: KATHERINE

customer_reviews.title: Shorter than standard twin mattress
customer_reviews.text: I love that this product is transparent about the materials used and you can sleep well knowing your kids aren’t breathing in any harmful chemicals during their sleep. One complaint would be the actual size of the twin mattress isn’t standard. We have twin bed with headboard & footboard and this mattress leaves a large gap at the footboard of about 3 inches. I haven’t taken an actual measurement of the mattress but our previous twin mattress fit perfectly without a gap.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Rodriguez Molina

customer_reviews.title: Happy Wife
customer_reviews.text: Bought two, delivery time not so great (COVID-19) other than that Wife gets a medium and loves it I like the firm side and am very happy with it also. Using on Adjustable Bases and the hybrid works well with the bases.
customer_reviews.author: Boatboy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: First new bed for me in years and it surpasses all my expectations and needs.....a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stinks
customer_reviews.text: Very strong smell, can't get rid of the smell and I wake up with major back pain. Might return although I have no idea how I would return it. Giving it another day hoping the smell will go away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Took a chance, pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I tried because of the 30 day no risk guarantee, and I'm glad. I didn't think I'd get this good quality for such a price. Very nice bed, with a nice concept on the flip. You can tell the difference, but it's not a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Bowling

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but
customer_reviews.text: We can't find the firm and soft labels at the end of the mattress....have had it a while for guests, no complaints thus far.
customer_reviews.author: BrigitteC

customer_reviews.title: Best bed I've ever purchased!
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable! I have really bad back pain and I sleep comfortably every night!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Good bed, great sleep
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful bed and an unbelievable value. I like medium firm side which has a nice pillow top. The firm side is pretty firm and would be good for exclusive back sleepers. I purchased the king size and you should plan having help setting it up out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: N. Dahl

customer_reviews.title: not level or flat after several months
customer_reviews.text: bed very comfortable ( i have bad back) but very little edge support and the middle is higher that the edges so for one person fine but two people not comfortable if you are near the edge feels like you want to roll off
customer_reviews.author: lorrie Finn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mattress, hard to go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress for a restful night's sleep. I looked around at a few choices before buying Nest's mattress but I am glad I made this choice. The firm side provides more comfort although both sides are good to sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: Vic2150

customer_reviews.title: mattress
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy. Feels like being hugged. Don't want to get out of bed in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: N. J. Null

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Warning bed is soft. Firm side sags a lot and is more like medium. I weigh 175lbs I can sleep on it alone and it’s ok (still too soft) but when my girl friend is over it can’t handle two people as a dip is created in the middle. Impossible for intimacy too u less you like having your body parts sagging all the way through a bed. Really should not be advertised as firm... It’s not. Gonna return it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Eaton

customer_reviews.title: The Mattress is Made to Order
customer_reviews.text: We had an initial miscommunication concerning shipping of our new mattress but when we reached out to the company our concerns were immediately addressed and we were thereafter kept informed about the entire process until the mattress was delivered. We've been very happy with the company and thr mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy A. Krenzke

customer_reviews.title: They work with our adjustable frames
customer_reviews.text: Not that impressed, they seem to be about the same as our cool gel ones.
customer_reviews.author: Muzz

customer_reviews.title: Good bed
customer_reviews.text: Good bed for value. Came fast. no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Shaldon Watson

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for those without tons of money
customer_reviews.text: This mattress was purchased for my college aged son. Instructions easy to follow and it expanded nicely. He says his sleep is awesome. Highly recommend but it is heavy!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie W.

customer_reviews.title: Nest didn’t stand by their product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased 2 the first was great, the 2nd one, one of the coils wouldn’t release and the best isn’t comfortable. While Nest would acknowledge the issue, they wouldn’t exchange it because the tag wasn’t intact claiming they needed the information. I did not remove the tag.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Dean

customer_reviews.title: Nest bedding
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at Nest bedding at their website to buy one for $1800 . When I was on Amazon and just put in nest bedding to see what came up and found this collaboration between both of them. So I ordered the Cal King for $500 , and is worth every dollar. Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.author: 585625CR

customer_reviews.title: Not good for me
customer_reviews.text: I think I had too much expectation. Somebody can feel that it is soft and comfortable. but not for me
customer_reviews.author: Changhwan

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable mattress I have owned
customer_reviews.text: I have slept on my mattress for several months and I love it. So comfortable. The “new” smell went away in a few days. Best mattress I have ever owned. I love it! By the way, first review I have ever posted.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have horrible back pain and decided I needed to change up my mattress! This one is so freaking comfy, it feels like a cloud! Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Better Sleep
customer_reviews.text: Mattress is good and our sleep has improved I believe, but still not feeling the cooling gel benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Osting

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and love the flip option. Highly suggest letting it air out for at *least* 48hrs. Good quality especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Fairwell

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Cozy and comfortable. Better than I had hoped for the price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Batman

customer_reviews.title: good bed but not for me
customer_reviews.text: like the bed a lot but did not solve my back issues very good customer service
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Barth

product_meta.title: FLIP by Nest Bedding, Amazon-Exclusive Double Sided Hybrid Bed in a Box, Cooling Gel Foam and Caliber Coil, CertiPUR-US, Made in The USA
product_meta.description: Size:QueenThe FLIP mattress by Nest Bedding is an Amazon-exclusive mattress that offers our customers a unique experience. This luxury hybrid, foam and coil, mattress is 10 inches tall and comes with both medium feel on the top and firm on the bottom, allowing sleepers to try both sides for optimal comfort. Take the guess work out of buying a mattress online by purchasing the FLIP mattress. Made in the USA; you can trust the quality and support American workers. From the trusted folks at Nest Bedding. One of the pioneers of the online mattress movement, we have years of experience making mattresses. This mattress will work well with any sleep system, box spring, bed frame or adjustable base. A luxury look and feel for a budget price, specifically made for our Amazon customers. Worried this mattress won't work out for you, simply follow the return prompts in Amazon, within your 30-night sleep trial. So FLIPin Cool! Technical Detail Breakdown: 0.75" quilted foam cover with 400 GSM poly/spandex blend 1" V250-010 Visco Gel Foam 6" 13.75 Gauge Caliber Coil System 0.75" 130-032 High Density Base Foam 0.5" 0.75" quilted foam cover with 400 GSM poly/spandex blend. Product Dimensions: Twin, 39" x 75" x 10" TwinXL, 39" x 79" x 10" Full, 54" x 75" x 10" Queen, 60" x 80" x 10" King, 76" x 80" x 10" CalKing, 72" x 84" x 10"
feature_bullets: HYBRID GEL FOAM AND COIL - We've combined cooling Visco Gel support foam with a durable Caliber Coil system, granting two sided firmness in the first flippable hybrid mattress online.

TWO LUXURY FEELS - Two breathable and ergonomically supportive sleep surfaces in a medium and firm feel designed for side, stomach and back sleepers. Sleeps comfortable and cool, with built in airflow and cool sleeping fabric.
AMAZON-EXCLUSIVE - We know it's hard to find a trusted brand on here. Made in the USA using CertiPUR-US certified foam. Easy returns through Amazon during the sleep trial.
SLEEP TRIAL & WARRANTY - 30 Night Sleep Trial that gives you the time you need to adjust to either firmness. Then backed by a 10-Year Limited Warranty.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars140 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
